products.name: Dairy Milk Chocolate Bar
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Cocoa and its products, Confectioneries, Chocolate candies, Chocolates, Milk chocolates
products.facts: ["Dairy Milk Chocolate Bar is made from high-quality cocoa sourced from sustainable farms.","The packaging of Dairy Milk is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendliness.","Dairy Milk uses fresh milk from local farms, ensuring a creamy texture and rich flavor.","The chocolate is certified by various quality assurance programs, ensuring it meets high standards of safety and taste."]

products.name: Vanilla Bean Organic Protein + 50 Superfoods
products.categories: Meat alternatives,Meat analogues,Dietary supplements,Bodybuilding supplements,Protein powders
products.facts: ["Made with organic vanilla bean for natural flavoring.","Contains 50 superfoods, including greens, fruits, and herbs for added nutrition.","Non-GMO and free from artificial additives, ensuring high-quality ingredients.","Sustainably sourced ingredients to promote ecological health and support organic farming practices."]

products.name: Fine ground sea salt almond flour crackers, sea salt
products.categories: Snacks, Salty snacks, Sweet snacks, Appetizers, Biscuits and cakes, Crackers
products.labels: No gluten, No GMOs, Non GMO project, Verified
products.facts: ["Made with fine ground sea salt and almond flour, providing a gluten-free alternative to traditional crackers.","Almond flour is a nutrient-dense ingredient, rich in healthy fats, protein, and fiber.","The use of sea salt enhances flavor while being a natural mineral source, often less processed than table salt.","These crackers are often produced with minimal ingredients, promoting a clean label and higher quality standards."]

products.name: Old Fashioned Oats imp
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Breakfasts,Cereals and potatoes,Cereals and their products,Breakfast cereals,Flakes,Cereal flakes,Rolled flakes,Rolled oats
products.labels: No artificial flavors, No GMOs, No preservatives, Non GMO project, 100% Whole Grain, American Heart Association Certified, en:orthodox-union-kosher
products.facts: ["Made from whole grain oats, which are a good source of dietary fiber and protein.","Produced using sustainable farming practices to minimize environmental impact.","Non-GMO and free from artificial preservatives, ensuring a natural product.","Packaged in recyclable materials to promote eco-friendliness."]

products.name: Quick 1-minute Oats
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Breakfasts,Cereals and potatoes,Cereals and their products,Breakfast cereals,Flakes,Cereal flakes,Rolled flakes,Rolled oats
products.labels: Kosher, No artificial flavors, No GMOs, Non GMO project, Orthodox Union Kosher, 100% Whole Grain, American Heart Association Certified, en:no-preservatives
products.facts: ["Quick 1-minute oats are made from whole grain oats that are steamed and then rolled thinner for faster cooking.","The product is often packaged in recyclable materials, promoting eco-friendliness and sustainability.","These oats are typically gluten-free, making them a suitable option for individuals with gluten sensitivities, provided they are processed in a gluten-free facility.","Quick 1-minute oats are rich in dietary fiber and protein, contributing to a healthy diet and promoting satiety."]

products.name: Coca Cola Zero
products.categories: Beverages, Carbonated drinks, Artificially sweetened beverages, Sodas, Diet beverages, Colas, Diet sodas, Diet cola soft drink
products.facts: ["Coca Cola Zero is packaged in a 355 ml aluminum can, which is 100% recyclable.","The beverage contains no sugar, using artificial sweeteners to provide a sweet taste without calories.","Coca Cola Zero is produced using water sourced from sustainable practices, minimizing environmental impact.","The brand has committed to reducing its carbon footprint and aims for all packaging to be made from recycled materials by 2030."]

products.name: Sour Cream
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Fermented milk products, Creams, Fermented creams, Sour creams
products.facts: ["Sour cream is primarily made from cream that has been fermented with lactic acid bacteria.","Many brands of sour cream use milk from cows that are raised on farms with sustainable practices.","Sour cream is often packaged in recyclable containers, reducing environmental impact.","High-quality sour cream contains no artificial preservatives or additives, focusing on natural ingredients."]

products.name: Purified Water
products.facts: ["Purified water is typically sourced from municipal supplies or natural sources and undergoes filtration and purification processes to remove impurities.","The packaging for purified water, such as PET plastic bottles, is recyclable, contributing to reduced environmental impact when properly disposed of.","Purified water is tested for contaminants and meets safety standards set by regulatory agencies, ensuring its quality and suitability for consumption.","The production of purified water requires significant energy and resources, highlighting the importance of sustainable practices in water bottling."]

products.name: Maïs tendre France
products.labels: Labels de distributeurs,Sans OGM,Fruits et Légumes de France,Nutriscore,Nutriscore A,Triman

products.facts: ["MaÃ¯s tendre France is made from 100% French sweet corn, ensuring high quality and freshness.","The product is packaged in eco-friendly materials, promoting sustainability and reducing environmental impact.","MaÃ¯s tendre France is grown without the use of pesticides, aligning with ecological farming practices.","The sweet corn is harvested at peak ripeness, preserving its natural sweetness and nutritional value."]

products.name: Nerds Candy - Rainbow
products.ingredients_text: DEXTROSE, SUGAR, MALIC ACID, CORN SYRUP, NATURAL FLAVORS, CARNAUBA WAX, COLOR ADDED, CARMINE COLOR, BLUE 1 LAKE, BLUE 1, BLUE 2 LAKE, RED 40 LAKE, YELLOW 5 LAKE, YELLOW 5, YELLOW 6, GUM ACACIA
products.facts: ["Nerds Candy - Rainbow is primarily made from sugar, corn syrup, and natural and artificial flavors.","The packaging is made from recyclable materials, promoting eco-friendliness.","Nerds are gluten-free, making them suitable for individuals with gluten sensitivities.","The candy is produced in facilities that follow strict quality control standards to ensure safety and consistency."]

products.name: RAVIOLI VEGETARIENS issus de l'agriculture biologique.
products.ingredients_text:
Eau, ravioli* (semoule de _blé_ dur*, eau, chapelure* [contient _blé_*], oignons*, _œufs_*, huile de tournesol*, persil*, sel, épices* [cannelle*, poivre noir*, muscade*, girofle*], poivre*, ail*), concentré de tomates* 11%, huile de tournesol*, sucre roux*, oignons*, sel de mer, carottes*, basilic*, _céleri_*, romarin*, persil*, ail*, thym*, marjolaine*, sarriette*, paprika*, poivre*, jus de citron concentré*.
*Biologique
Peut contenir des traces de lait, soja, fruits à coque, poissons et crustacés.
products.labels: Bio, Bio européen, Agriculture non UE, Agriculture UE, Agriculture UE/Non UE, FR-BIO-01, Fabriqué en France, À l'huile de tournesol, AB Agriculture Biologique
products.facts: ["Made with organic flour and fresh vegetables, ensuring a high-quality ingredient list.","Produced using sustainable farming practices that reduce environmental impact.","Free from artificial preservatives and additives, promoting a healthier choice.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials, supporting recycling and reducing waste."]
